examples.example: 通过不懈的努力，他终于在事业上取得了巨大的成功。

translate.english: Through unremitting efforts, he finally achieved great success in his career.

examples.example: 他凭借自己的智慧和毅力取得了令人瞩目的成就。

translate.english: He has achieved remarkable achievements with his wisdom and perseverance.

examples.example: 只要我们坚持不懈地奋斗，就一定能在人生中取得辉煌的成就。

translate.english: As long as we persevere in striving, we will definitely be able to achieve brilliant achievements in life.
